short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can search popular recipes in new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to easily search and find delicious recipes directly in your new tab page. RecipeSearch.Pro's extension is a fast an easy way for home cooks to get free access to thousands of popular recipes all for free! Never stress out about what's for dinner again!

How do I uninstall this extension?
1. Click on the button with three horizontal lines or the three dots found in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome™ browser.
2. From the drop-down menu click More Tools > Extensions.
3. Next to the extension you want to remove, click Remove.
4. If you simply want to hide the extension but not remove it, you can un-check the Enabled button.
5. Restart Chrome™ browser

Permissions used & reasons:
"Replace the page you see when opening a new tab"
This allows us to show recipe results in the most convenient place, directly in the new tab! 
 -new tab page with free web search engine directed to Google.

This extension configures your browser’s new tab search engine to Google.

Chrome is a trademark of Google LLC. Use of it here does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by Google LLC
